field.name: Preferred Language
field.substitution: Arabic AR=Arabic AR###Czech CS=Czech CS###German D=German D###Danish DK=Danish DK###Spanish E=Spanish E###Greek EL=Greek EL###Latin American Spanish ESA=Latin American Spanish ESA###French F=French F###Canadian French FRC=Canadian French FRC###Croatian HR=Croatian HR###Hungarian HU=Hungarian HU###Italian I=Italian I###Icelandic IS=Icelandic IS###Hebrew IW=Hebrew IW###Japanese JA=Japanese JA###Korean KO=Korean KO###Lithuanian LT=Lithuanian LT###Norwegian N=Norwegian N###Dutch NL=Dutch NL###Polish PL=Polish PL###Portuguese PT=Portuguese PT###Brazilian Portuguese PTB=Brazilian Portuguese PTB###Romanian RO=Romanian RO###Russian RU=Russian RU###Swedish S=Swedish S###Finnish SF=Finnish SF###Slovak SK=Slovak SK###Slovenian SL=Slovenian SL###Thai TH=Thai TH###Turkish TR=Turkish TR###American English US=American English US###Simplified Chinese ZHS=Simplified Chinese ZHS###Traditional Chinese ZHT=Traditional Chinese ZHT###""=""

field.name: Allow Retroactive Pricing
field.substitution: All Orders=All Orders###Open Orders Only=Open Orders Only

field.name: Match Approval Level
field.substitution: 2 Way=2 Way###3 Way=3 Way###4 Way=4 Way###""=""

field.name: Allow manual price update on fulfilled orders
Default promised date from requested date
Autogenerate orders from requester-negotiated requisition lines
Bypass approvals for automatically submitted orders
Enable automatic sourcing to contract purchase agreements
Autogenerate orders from requisition lines sourced to agreements
Consumption Advice Summary
field.substitution: All organizations=All organizations###Organization=Organization###Organization and item=Organization and item###Organization, item and transaction date=Organization, item and transaction date

field.name: Negotiation Style
field.substitution: Composite Scoring RFQ=Composite Scoring RFQ###Equipment - Clinical=Equipment - Clinical###Equipment - Non-Clinical=Equipment - Non-Clinical###Internal Cost Factors Simple=Internal Cost Factors Simple###Lifescience=Lifescience###Materials, Equipment, and Supplies=Materials, Equipment, and Supplies###Public Works Contracts (Construction)=Public Works Contracts (Construction)###Services - Clinical=Services - Clinical###Services - Construction=Services - Construction###Services - Consulting=Services - Consulting###Services - General=Services - General###Services - IT=Services - IT###Simple Negotiation=Simple Negotiation###Standard Negotiation=Standard Negotiation###Standard with Abstract=Standard with Abstract###Supplies - Clinical=Supplies - Clinical###Supplies - Non-Clinical=Supplies - Non-Clinical###Two Stage Negotiation=Two Stage Negotiation###W1000=W1000

field.name: Rank Indicator
field.substitution: Best or trailing=Best or trailing###1,2,3...=1,2,3...###No indicator displayed=No indicator displayed

field.name: Purchasing Documents
field.substitution: Create in Oracle Fusion Purchasing=Create in Oracle Fusion Purchasing###Export using web service=Export using web service

field.name: Display requirement scoring criteria to suppliers
Display best price in blind negotiations
Enforce supplier's previous round price as start price
